messages.title: Change in Britain
messages.content: Labour has failed us... but is this the kind of change we want? The SNP have failed us... For a real change in Britain there is only one choice

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tax cuts that put money back in your pockets.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair start for all our children
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller classes from a £2.5 billion pledge
Jobs by making Britain a leader in the new green economy
By giving you the right to sack corrupt MPs

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron, Angus Robertson, SNP, Gordon Brown, Tony Blair
